verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from the Lord<WH3068> in the days<WH3117> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, saying<WH559>,

Go<WH1980> unto the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>, and speak<WH1696> unto them<WH935>, and bring them into the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>, into one<WH259> of the chambers<WH3957>, and give them wine<WH3196> to drink<WH8248>.

Then I took<WH3947> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Jeremiah<WH3414>, the son<WH1121> of Habaziniah<WH2262>, and his brothers<WH251>, and all his sons<WH1121>, and the whole house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>;

And I brought<WH935> them into the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>, into the chamber<WH3957> of the sons<WH1121> of Hanan<WH2605>, the son<WH1121> of Igdaliah<WH3012>, a man<WH376> of God<WH430>, which was by<WH681> the chamber<WH3957> of the princes<WH8269>, which was above<WH4605> the chamber<WH3957> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Shallum<WH7967>, the keeper<WH8104> of the door<WH5592>:

And I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397> pots<WH1375> full<WH4392> of wine<WH3196>, and cups<WH3563>, and I said<WH559> unto them<WH8354>, Drink you wine<WH3196>.

But they said<WH559>, We will drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196>: for Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> our father<WH1> commanded<WH6680> us<WH559>, saying, You shall drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196>, neither you<WH1121>, nor your sons for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>:

Neither shall you build<WH1129> house<WH1004>, nor sow<WH2232> seed<WH2233>, nor plant<WH5193> vineyard<WH3754>, nor have any<WH3117>: but all your days you shall live<WH3427> in tents<WH168>; that you may live<WH2421> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> in<WH6440> the land<WH127> where you be strangers<WH1481>.

Thus have we obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> our father<WH1> in all that he has commanded<WH6680> us<WH8354>, to drink no wine<WH3196> all our days<WH3117>, we<WH802>, our wives, our sons<WH1121>, nor our daughters<WH1323>;
Nor to build<WH1129> houses<WH1004> for us to live in<WH3427>: neither have we vineyard<WH3754>, nor field<WH7704>, nor seed<WH2233>:
But we have lived in<WH3427> tents<WH168>, and have obeyed<WH8085>, and done<WH6213> according to all that Jonadab<WH3122> our father<WH1> commanded us<WH6680>.

But it came to pass<WH5019>, when Nebuchadrezzar king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> came up<WH5927> into the land<WH776>, that we said<WH559>, Come<WH935>, and let us go<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>, and for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Syrians<WH758>: so we live<WH3427> at Jerusalem<WH3389>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Go<WH1980> and tell<WH559> the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, Will you not receive<WH3947> instruction<WH4148> to listen<WH8085> to my words<WH1697>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>.

The words<WH1697> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394>, that he commanded<WH6680> his sons<WH1121> not to drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196>, are performed<WH6965>; for unto this day<WH3117> they drink<WH8354> none<WH8085>, but obey their father<WH1>'s commandment<WH4687>: nevertheless I have spoken<WH1696> unto you<WH7925>, rising early and speaking<WH1696>; but you listened not unto me<WH8085>.

I have sent<WH7971> also unto you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them<WH559>, saying, Return<WH7725> you now every man<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and mend<WH3190> your doings<WH4611>, and go<WH3212> not after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them<WH3427>, and you shall live in the land<WH127> which I have given<WH5414> to you and to your fathers<WH1>: but you have not inclined<WH5186> your ear<WH241>, nor listened unto me<WH8085>.

Because the sons<WH1121> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> have performed<WH6965> the commandment<WH4687> of their father<WH1>, which he commanded<WH6680> them<WH5971>; but this people has not listened unto me<WH8085>:

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Behold<WH935>, I will bring upon Judah<WH3063> and upon all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> all the evil<WH7451> that I have pronounced<WH1696> against them<WH1696>: because I have spoken unto them<WH8085>, but they have not heard; and I have called<WH7121> unto them<WH6030>, but they have not answered.

And Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Because you have obeyed<WH8085> the commandment<WH4687> of Jonadab<WH3082> your father<WH1>, and kept<WH8104> all his precepts<WH4687>, and done<WH6213> according unto all that he has commanded you<WH6680>:

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> shall not want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me for ever<WH3117>.
